alert.note: Alert for LaMoure; Logan (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 20 at 3:59PM CDT until June 20 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN LAMOURE AND EASTERN LOGAN COUNTIES... At 359 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles south of Gackle, or 22 miles west of Edgeley, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gackle, Lehr, Jud and Alfred. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
